thread.title: Twitter Is Trolling Kanye West Because His New Yeezys Look Like ’80s Reeboks
thread.title_full: Twitter Is Trolling Kanye West Because His New Yeezys Look Like ’80s Reeboks

author: Robert Anthony
title: Twitter Is Trolling Kanye West Because His New Yeezys Look Like ’80s Reeboks
text:
— #CougarBæ (@iMsBianca) March 23, 2017 It sure seems like it! New info for Yeezy Calabasas Powerphase's, were pushed back but be ready… they might just be dropping soon #TeamMP pic.twitter.com/0TneZOkrvl 
— MannyPProductions (@MannyPShoots) March 20, 2017 Despite how similar Kanye’s new sneakers look to old Reeboks, there’s one thing we know for sure — people will STILL buy them. 
— Impeach Trump (@JessicayassYa) March 23, 2017 
Kanye West’s Yeezy brand is quickly transforming into the Apple of the sneaker world. 
No matter how many times he shoves the same product in your face time and time again, there will always be lines wrapping around the block as “stans” eagerly try to get their hands on his latest swag. 
IT’S FOR THE KIDS! 
Perhaps this was just a stunt to test exactly how influential Kanye is these days. Something tells me this just inflated his ego just a tad bit more. 
All jokes aside, I just have one question for you, Kanye… WHAT ARE THOSE?!?! 
As of now, there is no confirmed release date for the new Yeezys, but they’re expected to cost only $120 , according to Sneaker News. Meet The Artist Behind The Kanye False Idol Oscar Statue To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
